title: BUGSPLAT
body: So I started my day as usual, turning on PC, loading up League and beginning a custom game. As soon as the loading screen appeared it Bugsplat. So I try opening as Admin, and still. Bugsplat. So I uninstalled and reinstall league. Still. Bugsplat.  I finally factory reset computer and still..bugsplat.  can anyone help out?

replies.body:
Bugsplats usually indicate that there's either an issue with a system driver or hardware in your computer. We've consolidated a list of solutions inside our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), so I'd recommend giving those steps a try before we move forward with troubleshooting.

Let me know if this helped~
I tried every single step on that guide, and still nothing, thanks for responding though

We've seen some Bugsplat upon load-in if a change in displays occurred without changing resolution settings or resetting the input file. For example, you're using a display with a resolution of 2560x1440, then next week your monitor dies and you have to replace it with a temporary display that runs 1920x1200. If you tried loading into game directly after swapping, there's a high chance League will still be trying to launch into the game at 2560x1440. If this happened, your temporary display would not be able to run that resolution, so you'd see instant bugsplats until you swapped back over to the other display or reset League's intention to grab that older resolution.

Please let me know if you happened to change your display recently so we can work to resolve this.

I had gone to a friend's house and used his monitor where it did change the resolution. But it still doesn't work and I'm using my old monitor. How would I go about changing the resolution when I can't even get in game?

I suspect League had saved that other resolution and is currently trying to launch League with that resolution, which your current monitor cannot display. The steps below will assist you with resetting the input file that's saved server-side.

First, you'll  **log into the game** then navigate to your config folder, which should be in the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

**Delete** these two files:
>** input.ini
PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted these two files, close the League client out, then launch it again. You'll want to hop into a custom match to confirm the change did anything and that you can reach in-game. Your hotkeys will all be reset to default, so be sure to make any custom hotkey changes before you hop into a real game.

Let me know if this worked.
Thank you so much! This worked and I hope you have happy holidays!

Well, it worked when I loaded a custom game it worked fine, but then I tried to queue up with some friends and try out the new Braum skin, and it bugsplated. Now it's doing it for everything again....

Oh noooo. D:

In order to troubleshoot it further, I'd like to have this escalated to our tech specialists, who will be able to pinpoint exactly why this is happening after looking at your system logs. I'd like you to grab some of those logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attach them to a [**support ticket.**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you ran into issues.
Okay, I sent it in and I'm waiting for a response as I am typing this, thank you for all the help once again and I hope we can fix this all :)

it's been happening to me multiple games I played several games today and I kept client on and didn't restart my comp or anyhting and ever since my third game it's been bugsplatting everytime I go to load screen and sometimes it will just stay black and won't do anything.

and I believe my first game my league crashed and I restarted and like 30 LoL clients popped up and kept restarting even when I deleted them in control panel they kept going away then reappearing and then when I got it to finish I tried opening again and it worked and I got into game around when first minion wave was mostly killed.

and ill be honest im really pissed because I lost 4 games because of this happening to me or my teamates and I lost 8/2 promos and of the otehr 4 I didn't lose my team was significantly worse the other team.

Hi since the day before last my game was working perfectly fine until yesterday when i started to constently splat everytime i load into a game and there would be nothing i could do about it  i have the Log at hand and hope that anyone can help me please ASAP
